suggested_query: reveal the intricate folds of the human body, as if the very fabric of reality was being pulled apart to expose the inner workings of the soul. The casting, once a solid block of stone, now seemed to radiate an otherworldly energy, as if the artist had somehow managed to imbue it with a spark of the divine.
